<<<<<<< HEAD
The strong helper, offering to beare euery mans burthen. Or, A treatise, teaching in all troubles how to cast our burden vpon God but chiefly deliuering infallible grounds of comfort for quieting of troubled consciences. By Iohn Haivvard. Hayward, John, D.D.
The second edition, corrected and inlarged.
[26], 611, [1] p.
By Iohn Beale, for William Welby, Imprinted at London : 1614.
This is the only edition with a dedication to Israel and Bathsheba Owen. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

The second edition, corrected and inlarged.
[26], 611, [1] p.
By Iohn Beale, for William Welby, Imprinted at London : 1614.
This is the only edition with a dedication to Israel and Bathsheba Owen. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
